00015 #include "boost/type_traits/detail/template_arity_spec.hpp"
00016 #include "boost/mpl/aux_/lambda_support.hpp"
00017 
00018 #define BOOST_TT_AUX_TYPE_TRAIT_DEF1(trait,T,result) \
00019 template< typename T > struct trait \
00020 { \
00021     typedef result type; \
00022     BOOST_MPL_AUX_LAMBDA_SUPPORT(1,trait,(T)) \
00023 }; \
00024 \
00025 BOOST_TT_AUX_TEMPLATE_ARITY_SPEC(1,trait) \
00026 
00027 
00028 #define BOOST_TT_AUX_TYPE_TRAIT_SPEC1(trait,spec,result) \
00029 template<> struct trait<spec> \
00030 { \
00031     typedef result type; \
00032     BOOST_MPL_AUX_LAMBDA_SUPPORT_SPEC(1,trait,(spec)) \
00033 }; \
00034 
00035 
00036 #define BOOST_TT_AUX_TYPE_TRAIT_IMPL_SPEC1(trait,spec,result) \
00037 template<> struct trait##_impl<spec> \
00038 { \
00039     typedef result type; \
00040 }; \
00041 
00042 
00043 #define BOOST_TT_AUX_TYPE_TRAIT_PARTIAL_SPEC1_1(param,trait,spec,result) \
00044 template< param > struct trait<spec> \
00045 { \
00046     typedef result type; \
00047 }; \
00048 
00049 
00050 #define BOOST_TT_AUX_TYPE_TRAIT_PARTIAL_SPEC1_2(param1,param2,trait,spec,result) \
00051 template< param1, param2 > struct trait<spec> \
00052 { \
00053     typedef result; \
00054 }; \
00055 
00056 
00057 #define BOOST_TT_AUX_TYPE_TRAIT_IMPL_PARTIAL_SPEC1_1(param,trait,spec,result) \
00058 template< param > struct trait##_impl<spec> \
00059 { \
00060     typedef result type; \
00061 }; \
